about_the_game:
Do you want even more Terraforming Mars?
Get the Original Promo Pack, coming with 7 cards, from the microbe-oriented corporation Splice to the game changing project Self-replicating Robots.

This DLC includes:

3 new corporations:
  • Splice
  • Recyclon
  • Arcadian Communities

4 new projects:
  • Small Asteroid
  • Snow Algae
  • Penguins
  • Self-Replicating Robot

This DLC is compatible with the other paid contents for Terraforming Mars.
This content is using the Generous Host feature.
